thread.title: BRIEF-Hub Group Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $2.99

title: BRIEF-Hub Group Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $2.99
text:
28 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Hub Group Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $2.99 Reuters Staff 
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Hub Group Inc: 
* HUB GROUP, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.30 TO $2.40 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.99 * Q4 REVENUE $4.0 BILLION 
* ‍ESTIMATE THAT 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES WILL RANGE FROM $150 MILLION TO $170 MILLION​ * TARGET OF $6 BILLION IN REVENUE IN NEXT FIVE YEARS​ 
* HUB GROUP-Q4 HAS $75.2 MILLION DECREASE IN INCOME TAXES RESULTING FROM ESTIMATE OF CHANGE TO DEFERRED TAX LIABILITY AT DEC 31, 2017 CAUSED BY TAX ACT 
* ‍Q4 INCLUDES A $75.2 MILLION DECREASE IN INCOME TAXES RESULTING FROM ESTIMATE OF CHANGE TO DEFERRED TAX LIABILITY AT DECEMBER 31, 2017​
